products.name: Tachus 10 ETS
products.shortDescription: The Tachus 10 ETS is a precision electronic target system designed for training and competition, providing instant feedback and high accuracy for shooters.
features: Compatible with various calibers and airguns

specifications.Application: 10m air rifle and pistol ISSF events
specifications.Target Movement: Automatic paper roll advancement after each shot
specifications.Installation: Simple, suitable for home and range
specifications.Intended Use: Personal training, club competitions, professional events
